reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor with clear lectures, but sometimes a bit too fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex topics and always available for help.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but not very engaging during lectures.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: The course was challenging, but the professor didn't provide enough support.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, though sometimes assignments are unclear.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging and enthusiastic, makes the subject fascinating.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Good professor, but grading is quite harsh.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures but can be difficult to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Very supportive and provides great feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and the professor is not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Cares about students' learning but sometimes too lenient with grading.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Good content but lacks real-world application in assignments.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and creates a great classroom environment.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but sometimes goes off-topic during lectures.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Incredible professor with a passion for sustainability. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Engaging and makes learning music theory fun, though assignments are tough.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Very supportive and always provides practical examples in class.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Lectures are unorganized, and the professor doesn't respond to emails.

reviews.subject: Education
reviews.review: Great at teaching pedagogy but tends to focus too much on theory.
